name: Northlane
description: '''Northlane''' are an Australian [[metalcore]] band from [[Blacktown]], formed in 2009. The band comprises guitarists Jon Deiley and Josh Smith, drummer Nic Pettersen and vocalist Marcus Bridge. Northlane have released six studio albums: ''[[Discoveries (Northlane album)|Discoveries]]'' (11 November 2011); ''[[Singularity (Northlane album)|Singularity]]'' (22 March 2013), which reached No. 3 on the [[ARIA Charts|ARIA Albums Chart]]; ''[[Node (album)|Node]]'' (24 July 2015), a number-one album; ''[[Mesmer (album)|Mesmer]]'' (24 March 2017), ''[[Alien (Northlane album)|Alien]]'' (2 August 2019) and ''[[Obsidian (Northlane album)|Obsidian]]'' (22 April 2022). At the [[ARIA Music Awards of 2015]] the group won the [[ARIA Award for Best Hard Rock or Heavy Metal Album|Best Hard Rock or Heavy Metal Album]] category for their album ''Node''. At the [[ARIA Music Awards of 2017]], the band won again with ''Mesmer''. The band won the Best Hard Rock or Heavy Metal Album category for the third time at the [[ARIA Music Awards of 2019]] for their 2019 album ''Alien''.
